channel.description: Recent content in batch on KONTOL

item.title: Kengan Ashura BATCH Subtitle Indonesia
item.description: JudulKengan Ashura Japaneseケンガンアシュラ Score7.45 ProduserNihon Ad Systems, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Shogakukan, KLab, Netflix, MAGNET TipeONA StatusFinished Airing Total Episode12 Durasi24 min per ep Tanggal RilisJul 31, 2019 StudioLarx Entertainment GenreAction Business deals are usually made through meetings and contracts; but in the world of Kengan Ashura, businesses resort to other means to make their decisions: by hiring gladiators. Yabako Sandrovich's Kengan Ashura depicts a world brimming with action, violence, and martial arts—one where powerful gladiators have fought in grand arenas since the Edo Period to settle the disputes of wealthy businesses and merchants.

item.title: Getsuyoubi No Tawawa S1 +OVA BD Subtitle Indonesia
item.description: JudulGetsuyoubi no Tawawa Japanese月曜日のたわわ Score6.44 ProduserNBCUniversal Entertainment Japan, i0+ TipeONA StatusFinished Airing Total Episode12 Durasi4 min per ep Tanggal RilisOct 10, 2016 to Dec 26, 2016 StudioPine Jam GenreSlice of Life, Ecchi The anime follows a salaryman who has a chance meeting with a girl named Ai on the train. They begin to meet every Monday on the train, with the man serving as her bodyguard on the crowded commute while they chat.

item.title: Mushoku Tensei BD subtitle indonesia
item.description: BATCH BEDE (SOFTSUB) JudulMushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu Japanese無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～ Score8.36 ProduserFrontier Works, TOHO animation, Hakuhodo DY Music & Pictures, BS11, Egg Firm, Kadokawa, GREE, Toho Music TipeTV StatusFinished Airing Total Episode11 Durasi23 min per ep Tanggal RilisJan 11, 2021 to Mar 22, 2021 StudioStudio Bind GenreDrama, Fantasy, Ecchi Despite being bullied, scorned, and oppressed all of his life, a thirty-four-year-old shut-in still found the resolve to attempt something heroic—only for it to end in a tragic accident.

item.title: Hanma Baki Dual Subs Indonesia & English
item.description: JudulHanma Baki: Son of Ogre Japanese範馬刃牙 SON OF OGRE Score7.61 ProduserNetflix TipeONA StatusFinished Airing Total Episode12 Durasi24 min per ep Tanggal RilisSep 30, 2021 StudioTMS Entertainment GenreAction Third part of the Baki series. .download-eps {font-size: 15px;font-weight: bold;padding: 10px;background: #f1f1f1;overflow: hidden;} .download-eps .smokettl {padding: 8px 10px;background: #fff;margin-bottom: 7px;} .download-eps ul {margin: 0;padding: 0;list-style: outside none none;overflow: hidden;} .download-eps ul li {margin-bottom: 7px;line-height: 31px !important;background: #fff;} .

item.title: Boku No Hero Academia S5 Batch X265
item.description: JudulBoku no Hero Academia 5th Season Japanese僕のヒーローアカデミア Score7.51 ProduserDentsu, Movic, YTV, Sony Music Entertainment, TOHO animation, Shueisha TipeTV StatusFinished Airing Total Episode25 Durasi23 min per ep Tanggal RilisMar 27, 2021 to Sep 25, 2021 StudioBones GenreAction, Comedy UA Academy's Class 1-A has been the focus of a substantial amount of public attention due to the multiple villain attacks they have faced over the past school year. This attention has left Class 1-A's rivals, Class 1-B, feeling quite bitter.

item.title: JoJo No Kimyou Na Bouken Batch
item.description: JudulJoJo no Kimyou na Bouken (TV) Japaneseジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Score7.96 ProduserYomiko Advertising, Warner Bros. Japan, Kamikaze Douga, KlockWorx, Shueisha TipeTV StatusFinished Airing Total Episode26 Durasi24 min per ep Tanggal RilisOct 6, 2012 to Apr 6, 2013 StudioDavid Production GenreAction, Adventure, Supernatural In 1868, Dario Brando saves the life of an English nobleman, George Joestar. By taking in Dario's son Dio when the boy becomes fatherless, George hopes to repay the debt he owes to his savior.

item.title: Hyouka Batch
item.description: JudulHyouka Japanese氷菓 Score8.12 ProduserLantis, Kadokawa Shoten, KlockWorx, chara-ani.com, Animation Do TipeTV StatusFinished Airing Total Episode22 Durasi25 min per ep Tanggal RilisApr 23, 2012 to Sep 17, 2012 StudioKyoto Animation GenreMystery, Slice of Life Energy-conservative high school student Houtarou Oreki ends up with more than he bargained for when he signs up for the Classics Club at his sister's behest—especially when he realizes how deep-rooted the club's history really is.

xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M8.59,16.58L13.17,12L8.59,7.41L10,6L16,12L10,18L8.59,16.58Z' fill='%23fff'/%3E%3C/svg%3E") center/24px no-repeat}.soraddl .sorattl h3{margin:0;font-size:inherit;display:inline-block;max-width:70%;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;line-height:1.2em;color:#fff;font-weight:600}.soraddl d='M7.41,8.58L12,13.17L16.59,8.58L18,10L12,16L6,10L7.41,8.58Z' fill='%23fff'/%3E%3C/svg%3E") center/24px no-repeat}.soraddl .soraurl{padding:4px 0;border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb}.soraddl .soraurl a{display:inline-block;background:#f0f2f3;padding:4px 7px;border-radius:3px;margin:2px;font-size:13px}.soraddl .soraurl a:hover,.soraddl.dlone .soraurl a:nth-child(1):hover{background:#444!important;color:#fff}.soraddl .soraurl a:nth-child(1){background:#0c70de;color:#fff;font-weight:500}.soraddl.dlone .soraurl{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.soraddl.dlone .soraurl .res{-webkit-box-flex:0;-ms-flex:0 0 16.66667%;flex:0 0 auto;max-height:27px;padding:4px 7px;background:#0c70de;color:#fff;font-weight:500;font-size:13px;text-align:center;border-radius:3px;margin:2px 4px 2px 0}.soraddl.dlone .soraurl .slink{flex-basis:0;-webkit-box-flex:1;flex-grow:1;max-width:100%;padding-left:0;padding-right:15px}.soraddl.dlone .soraurl a:nth-child(1){background:#f0f2f3!important;color:inherit;font-weight:400}
